SummaryEnglish: Little Lulu is the first-ever animated stand-up comic. Her best friend Annie is always there for her, and Lulu always has arguments with Tubby and the boys in his club. They are always tricking each other and get into crazy adventures in school, in the neighbourhood and in the park.

1.SummaryEnglish:
"Green Girl"
Lulu wants to sail her boat in the bathtub, but the water isn't green enough. So she uses all of Mrs. Moppet's green ink in the water. The next day, Lulu's skin is completely green, and she becomes a celebrity, until Mrs. ns Moppets learns the truth.

2.SummaryEnglish:
"Rainy Day Tag"
It's raining, and Lulu and Tubby both claim to each other over the phone that they have colds. To make the other feel better, they go over to the other's house, until finally they all bump into each other on the street.

3.SummaryEnglish:
"Beautiful Lulu"
Lulu is depressed after overhearing Tubby tell the other boys that she's the homeliest girl in the world. Mrs. Moppet shows her how silly boys can be when she dolls up Lulu and sends her outside. The boys discover this beautiful new stranger and get territorial over her.

4.SummaryEnglish:
"Alvin's Record Player"
Alvin buys a new record player that plays only one record: Mary Had a Little Lamb. With Alvin playing this over and over again, Mr. and Mrs. Moppet are about to blow their tops. Mr. Moppet buys Alvin's record player for twice the price, only to find that Alvin turned around and bought two more.

5.SummaryEnglish:
"Lulu's Television Debut"
On her way to exchange a vase for Mrs. Moppet, Wilbur dares Lulu to escape from a pair of handcuffs, which doesn't seem to so easy after all. Lulu is then being broadcasted on live TV carring a vase on her head, and her hands cuffed behind her back.

6.SummaryEnglish:
"Crybaby"
Alvin cries for no apparent reason. Tubby explains to him that men don't cry. Lulu says differently. Then Lulu and Tubby get into a scrap about men can't do this, or women can't do that.

7.SummaryEnglish:
"Snowball War"
The girls are tired of Tubby and the boys pelting them with snowballs. So Lulu starts an all-girl army to beat the boys at their own game. Tubby and the boys met their match, and the girls are satisfied.

8.SummaryEnglish:
"Jr. Detective Tubby"
Lulu discovers a message that appears all over town written in black crayon: ""Lulu Loves Tubby"". When she points this out to Tubby, he becomes Tubby the Detective to search the whole town to see who has a black crayon. After Lulu gives up, Tubby admits he's the culpret.

9.SummaryEnglish:
"Picnic Pirates"
Tubby find out that the girls are having a picnic on the island. Tubby, Willie, and Iggie arrive to releave the girls of their picnic basket. Tubby and Willie do this by swimming to the island naked. Iggie swims over later, only to find the girls waiting for him.

10.SummaryEnglish:
"Gilbert the Gorilla"
An angrry zoo gorilla named Gilbert falls in love with Lulu after she wears a stinky perfume. Gilbert escapes the zoo and finds his way to Lulu's house. Lulu takes Gilbert back to the zoo.

11.SummaryEnglish:
"Lulu's Snowbiz"
Lulu and Annie start a snow-shoveling business, only to find that they've got competition when Tubby and the boys are snow-shoveling too. Lulu and Annie manage to make more money that the boys, even though they hardly did work.

12.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Egg in the Shoe
12.SummaryEnglish:
"The Case of the Egg in the Shoe"
Mr. Moppet find an egg in his shoe, and put the blame on Lulu. Tubby goes undercover to find the real culpret, who turns out to be a chicken who flew into the Moppet's bedroom when the window was open.

13.SummaryEnglish:
"Business Girl"
Lulu and Annie starts a lemonade stand. Unfortunately, they meet quick competetion and trouble when the boys open their lemonade stand around the corner. The boys pull pranks by dropping frogs and ink in Lulu's lemonade. Lulu scares the boys away by having Annie drink the boy's lemonade, and pretending she was poisoned.

14.SummaryEnglish:
"The Pet Duck"
Lulu a duck follows Lulu home as if it were tame. She decides to keep the duck, until she learns that a clown lost his pet duck. Lulu discovers the duck is missing and sees what looks like roast duck in the oven. Lulu brings the clown another duck, but escorts Lulu home to find his real pet duck had come back after flying in and out the window.

15.SummaryEnglish:
"Lulu's Umbrella Service"
It's a rainy day, and Lulu starts an umbrella service which so far hasn't had any business, until fresh Wilbur Van Snobbe has Lulu chase him all over town, threatening to get his hat wet, and get Lulu in trouble.

16.SummaryEnglish:
"Friends and Enemies"
It's Lulu's birthday party, and she wants to invite everybody. She invites Tubby, Willie, Iggie, Alvin, Annie, and Jeannie and Joannie, but they can't make it. So Lulu invites her enemies, Gloria, Wilbur, and Johnny, who can make. At the party, Lulu gets a call from what sounds like a near-death Tubby. Lulu rushes over to Tubby's house to find her friends throwing her a surprise party.

17.SummaryEnglish:
"The Beauty Contest"
Tubby and the boys start a beauty contest to pick the prettiest girl in town. Gloria bribes the judges by picking her in exchange for kisses. Lulu and Annie decide to have a beauty contest for the prettiest boy in town. The boys bribe Lulu by not picking them. Lulu agrees on one conditon. In the end, Annie is named prettiest girl in town.

18.SummaryEnglish:
"The Rich Little Poor Boy"
Child star, Gregory Mandel is in town for a stage version of his newest movie: The Rich Little Poor Boy. Lulu trips, and finds the picture of it mixed with a picture of Gregory in the paper, making it lo

1.SummaryEnglish:
"Boy Cannon Ball"
Lulu is very skeptical about Tubby's cannon firing stunt. Lulu exposes the elements of the boys' trick.

2.SummaryEnglish:
"Noses Off"
Wilbur frames Lulu for breaking the nose off an antique bust. Wilbur's mom loves the look of the bust after Lulu and Annie crudely fixed it.

3.SummaryEnglish:
"Hairy Day"
Lulu and Tubby try to mix a formula to grow Lulu's dad some hair, but instead it stains his head blue. However the tonic they made actually works, only too well.

4.SummaryEnglish:
"The Popcorn Thief"
Tubby is hired for detective work at Annie's home cinema, enduring a girly night. It turns out he's in league with the popcorn snatchers Iggy and Willy.

6.SummaryEnglish:
"She Flies Through the Air"
Lulu and Tubby go skiing at Hilltop Mountain. Accidental mishaps going downhill make Lulu an honorary ski champion.

7.SummaryEnglish:
"Tiny Tot's Syrup"
Tired of Tiny Tot's Syrup and its bad taste, Lulu goes to the factory to lodge a complaint, which eventually makes the desired change to the taste.

8.SummaryEnglish:
"The Night Before Christmas"
Tubby's gang hatch a plan to trap Santa to get presents for themselves. A muddle occurs when Mr. Tomkins plays Santa tonight.

9.SummaryEnglish:
"The Piggy Bank Guard"
Tubby entrusts Lulu to guard his piggy bank so he won't spend it yet. Lulu quits her guard work when she realises he wanted to buy a present for Gloria.

10.SummaryEnglish:
"Space Kids"
Tubby's gang trick Annie and Lulu that their make-belief rocket ship and the trip to Mars is real and the two girls respond with their own trick.

11.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Disappearing Drum
11.SummaryEnglish:
"The Case of the Disappearing Drum"
Tubby thinks Mr. Moppet took Alvin's drum and tries to prove Lulu he is right, all the while making Mr. Moppet go distracted.

12.SummaryEnglish:
"From Hero to Zero"
Without any luck getting Gloria's attention, Tubby tries to be a hero to save Lulu, but Lulu takes credit for his heroic deeds.

13.SummaryEnglish:
"The Old Master"
A painter sells one of his paintings to an art museum but it is switched with a painting that Lulu drew.

14.SummaryEnglish:
"Swat Shot Pops"
Lulu doesn't have enough money for a present for her father's birthday. So she decides to swap one of Tubby's father's fish trophy for one.

15.SummaryEnglish:
"Detective Story"
Tubby becomes the spider again to follow a suspicious looking man believed to be a bank robber. However he is actually a detective looking for the real thief.

16.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Missing Wig
16.SummaryEnglish:
"The Case of the Missing Wig"
Someone stole Annie's wig for her doll and Lulu asks Tubby for help.

17.SummaryEnglish:
"Froglegs"
Lulu and Tubby try to find Frogs to get Froglegs.

18.SummaryEnglish:
"A Wrong Move"
Lulu tries to find wood to help her father build a book shelf.

19.SummaryEnglish:
"Special Delivery"
Lulu wonders where babies come from.

20.SummaryEnglish:
"Little Sew and Sews"
The West Side Boys attack both Tubby's gang and Lulu's friends and Lulu decides to get even.

21.SummaryEnglish:
"Tubby's Doll"
Tubby get a doll from aunt Martha and tries to get rid of it.

22.SummaryEnglish:
"Tuxedo Tango"
Lulu is asked by her father to pick up a tuxedo for him but she accidentally picks up officer McNabb's uniform.

23.SummaryEnglish:
"The Football Star"
Tubby's gang is challenged by the West Side Boys to a football game.

24.SummaryEnglish:
"Spook Delivery"
Lulu and Tubby are asked to deliver a package to an old abandoned house.

25.SummaryEnglish:
"The Dance"
Gloria invited Tubby's Gang to the dance and Lulu and her friends stop her with Monkeys.

26.SummaryEnglish:
"Locked Out"
Lulu is locked outside her house in the night and tries to get back in.

27.SummaryEnglish:
"The Kissing Game"
Tubby makes a bet with Wilbur that Lulu can kiss him.

28.SummaryEnglish:
"Leaves for Everyone"
Lulu is asked by her father to rake leaves and she tries to trick Tubby's gang into doing it.

29.SummaryEnglish:
"The Fuzzythingus Poopi"
Lulu tries to find a gift for her mother's birthday.

30.SummaryEnglish:
"A Moving Experience"
Lulu overhears her parents and believes she is moving away.

31.SummaryEnglish:
"Oh Christmas Tree"
Lulu and her father go to the forest to cut a tree for Christmas, which doesn't come free like they thought.

32.SummaryEnglish:
"Santa's Snowman"
Lulu and her friends are met by Santa's Snowmen, actually Tubby's gang cheating them out of their money, but they learn that giving things is more important.

33.SummaryEnglish:
"The Snoopers"
Lulu and Tubby receive presents that don't coincide with their gender. This is just a game Mrs. Moppet and Mrs. Tomkins are playing to teach their children not snoop for presents.

34.SummaryEnglish:
"The Big Jewel Robbery"
A thief steals a bunch of jewels and after hiding them, believes that Lulu and Annie stole them.

35.SummaryEnglish:
"Pot Luck"
Tubby has a fight with Willy. Meanwhile the West Side Boys plot to steal the boys clubhouse.

36.SummaryEnglish:
"The Spook Tree"
Lulu overhears from Tubby about the Spook Tree and that if you make a wish on it at midnight, it will come true.

37.SummaryEnglish:
"Valentine's Day"
Gloria is getting the boys to give her a valentine, while Lulu has none until the boys notice this.

38.SummaryEnglish:
"Gertie Greenbean"
Lulu becomes friends with Gertie and they both team against Wilbur who wants to be rid of Gertie.

39.SummaryEnglish:
"Stop Fiddling Around"
While cutting Onions, Lulu believes she broke her father's favourite pipe. Tubby tries to learn the violin.

40.SummaryEnglish:
"Lucky Lulu"
Lulu and Annie find a giant turkey named "Alice" and try to protect her from Tubby's gang and Lulu's dad.

41.SummaryEnglish:
"Pieces of Eight"
Lulu, Tubby and Alvin go to the beach and hear about a hot dog contest.

42.SummaryEnglish:
"Jumping Beans"
Both Lulu and Tubby have to run errands. They trick Iggie into doing them.

43.SummaryEnglish:
"Alvinsitting"
Lulu is asked by her mother to babysit Alvin.

44.SummaryEnglish:
"Two Lulus"
Lulu tells Tubby's gang a story about Mr. Winkle who turns kids into mannequins. They believe her when they see a mannequin of Lulu herself.

45.SummaryEnglish:
"The Hat"
Lulu and Tubby wreak her mother's new hat and try to fix it.

46.SummaryEnglish:
"Prisoner Exchange"
Marty the Midget, a criminal who looks like Tubby, escapes from prison and switches places with Tubby.

47.SummaryEnglish:
"The Balloon Derby"
A contest is held to see how many balloons can be caught.

48.SummaryEnglish:
"Dummy Skeleton"
Lulu with Annie and Tubby with Iggy have mix up between a mannequin and a skeleton delivery, which also causes quite a commotion.

49.SummaryEnglish:
"The Bear Trap"
Lulu, Tubby, and Wilbur foil a pair of thieves trying to steal his father's money.

50.SummaryEnglish:
"Shirley the Shadow"
Lulu tells Alvin a story about a little girl who lost her shadow.

51.SummaryEnglish:
"A Dog's Life Saver"
Lulu wants to have a dog. She tries to stop a dog catcher from capturing a stray.

52.SummaryEnglish:
"The Bogeyman"
Lulu tells Alvin a story about how she met the Bogeyman.

53.SummaryEnglish:
"Tattoos"
A new tattoo parlour opens. The idea of children having tattoos causes an uproar from their mothers, but the tattoos are only pictures.

54.SummaryEnglish:
"Mimibur"
Lulu and Annie dress Wilbur as a girl and send him to his own party, causing him a lot of humiliation.

55.SummaryEnglish:
"Lancelot Jr."
Mr. Van Snobbe buys an old suit of armor that was once worn by Lancelot Jr.. Legend has it when the three suits of armor are reunited, the spirit of the Lancelot family process the armors. Wilbur steps inside the suit of armor, only to find him having trouble seeing, and knocking things down with the sword. Mr. Van Snobbe has visiters, when Lulu and Tubby hide in the other suit of armors. They find the armors alive, and are being chased by them. When Mr. Van Snobbe finds Wilbur in the Lancelot Jr. suit, Lulu and Tubby escape via a catapault and an open window.

56.SummaryEnglish:
"Lucky Lady"
The kids discover on the front page of the newspaper that a lady is offering $10 to the most polite kid in town. The boys then cause trouble when all trying to earn the $10. Each lady they help, are displeased with the boys' ill behavior. When they knock down Mrs. Van Snobbe, Lulu and Annie help her up, and the two earn the $10, while Wilbur is shocked to see it was his mother who sent in the article.
Fiv

57.SummaryEnglish:
"Five Little Babies"
After Lulu gets pranked by Wilbur and the boys, she and Annie get back at them by stealing their clothes and dressing them up in diapers

58.SummaryEnglish:
"Potato Kids"
When Lulu and Mrs. Moppet peal potatoes, she finds one that looks exactly like Tubby. When she goes to show it to him, everyone thinks she's trying to harrass him. Tubby then gets revenge by finding a potato that looks just like her. Lulu is offended, while Annie finds it hilarious, so Lulu finds a potato that looks just like Annie. Thus breaking the potato war.

59.SummaryEnglish:
"The Ventriloquist"
Tubby practices throwing his voice, by making Lulu's mirror, Gloria's poodle, Alvin's toy soldier, Annie's sunglasses, Wilbur's money, and Officer McNab's shoes talk. When Officer McNab's shoes talk, Lulu notices Tubby's cheeks moving to the exact same syllables. Lulu then has Tubby over, when he discovers everything really is talking! Tubby then learns his lesson.

60.SummaryEnglish:
"Bunny Fun"
Tubby has to be the Easter Bunny in the Easter Pagent. He is embarrased by the purple bunny suit and when the Tompkins car breaks down, he and Lulu have to find gas. Tubby is then chased by the West Side Boys. Once on stage,

1.SummaryEnglish: The Haunted House: Tubby and the fellers dare Lulu to enter an empty house, which is known to be haunted. That night, Lulu complies, while Lulu enters the house, Tubby and the fellers dress up in sheets to pose as ghost. They hide in a closet, and when Iggie accidentally yells before time, Lulu runs out, and hide behind a tree, when she hears the fellers making fun of her, she puts 2 and 2 together, so she has Annie pose as the ghost of the house, and the fellers freak out.

2.SummaryEnglish: Lulu tries to find her father's lucky gold piece.

3.SummaryEnglish: Lulu tells Alvin a story of how she shrank when she went out to play in the rain.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tubby charges kids who want to see an egg shaped rock.

5.TitleEnglish: The Little Girl Who Never Heard of Ghost
5.SummaryEnglish: Alvin locks Lulu in the room and forces her to tell a ghost story. Lulu then tells him the story of a girl who has never heard of ghosts.

6.TitleEnglish: The Case of the Missing Perfume
6.SummaryEnglish: Lulu hires Tubby to find her mother's missing perfume.

7.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Annie set up an apple juice stand. Tubby gets an idea of dressing up as a wild boy and scaring the girls, but things go too far when the police and grown ups get involved, thinking the wild boy to be real.

8.SummaryEnglish: The West Side Boys take over the club house, while the police uses whistles to alert each other instead of a siren.

9.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Alvin visit a circus, but Iggie, Eddie and Willie (by order of Tubby) sneaks backstage and scares off the elephant by popping a balloon. The elephant chases the children around.

10.SummaryEnglish: The clubhouse is infested by a bird, who keeps on attacking the boys to keep them away from her nest.

11.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Tubby go fishing. Lulu has a dream that a merman tries to eat her.

12.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Tubby try to clean off a stain from the carpet, making a bigger mess than before.

14.SummaryEnglish: Tubby is staying with the Moppets for the weekend and he causes the family some inconveniences.

15.SummaryEnglish: Tubby and Iggie see a mud monster. They get help from Lulu and Annie to try and catch it.

16.SummaryEnglish: A snowstorm causes a blackout across the city.

17.SummaryEnglish: Tubby accidentally received an audio record of good manners, he tries to use it impress Gloria

18.SummaryEnglish: Lulu has a loose tooth and she tells her friends. However her friends misheard her and this leads to a bunch of rumors.

19.SummaryEnglish: In a planetarium, Lulu and her friends go a space voyage, which turns out to be a space simulation experience.

20.SummaryEnglish: Lulu with Tubby sees a woman in the market who looks just like her

21.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and her friends have a camp out in her backyard. Tubby and his friends try to ruin their fun.

22.SummaryEnglish: Bowlfingers: Tubby has put off his fence painting job for weeks now, but when he is needed for Lulu and Iggie's bowling match, he figures whats a couple more hours? While at the bowling alley, Tubby stocks up on hotdogs, dripping mustard all over the place. At the end of the match, all the weight he gain has taken it's toll, and now, Tubby's fingers are stuck in the bowling ball, and they won't budge. To keep Mr. Tompkins from suspecting anything, the dress the it up as their new foreign friend from Sweden. After Mr. Tompkins is satisfied, Tubby hears the ice cream truck, and the ball flies right off of his fingers, and smashes the fence.

23.SummaryEnglish: Tubby dresses up as a fortune teller.

24.SummaryEnglish: Lulu with Annie creates a new shampoo to clean pet hair.

25.SummaryEnglish: Polly Patrol: Lulu is given the responsiblity of taking care of Miss Feeny's bird, Percy for the day. After Lulu brings him home, Tubby lets him escape from the cage. Percy flies all over town, causing trouble when he repeats phrases like ""stupid Gloria"", or ""stinky Annie"", or ""Fat-so McNab"". Lulu dresses Tubby up as a giant chicken to draw the attention of Percy, but whenever they get close enough, he flies off to another spot. In the end, when Lulu comes home, she finds Percy being fed by Mrs. Moppet, while Tubby gets a new job as the mascot for a new chicken joint.

27.SummaryEnglish: Tubby decides to sell a house cleaning robot that Lulu made for a science fair.

28.SummaryEnglish: No Pain, No Gain: Lulu and the gang play a game of hockey, but when she knocks Tubby out of the way, he twists his ankle. The doctor says everything will be fine, but Lulu still thinks its serious. Tubby fakes, and has Lulu run erands for him by picking up a comicbook from the Westside of town, and picking up a cake, and painting the clubhouse. When she goes back to ask what color, she sneaks a peak into Tubby's room to find hims playing football in his room. Lulu show him, by painting the clubhouse pink with flowers.

29.SummaryEnglish: On career day, Lulu becomes a news reporter.

30.SummaryEnglish: Tubby and Lulu performs in a magic show.

31.SummaryEnglish: First-Aid Brigade: Lulu and the gang are all members of the local Squirrel Scouts. Today, everyone gets the chance to earn a ""first-aid badge"". They go through various types of training, like what would Tubby do if Willie wasn't able to get up after a bike crash (he'd take Willie's back), and what would Lulu do if Iggie had a stubbed toe (she'd cast his whole foot.) Now the squirrel scouts have to go out in public to help out any citizens in any way they can. But when it comes to helping someone, they get into a fight, because they ALL want the badges. The fights get so bad, they get each other injured. In the end, they all receive the badges for bandaging each other.

32.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Tubby work at a movie theater.

33.SummaryEnglish: Tubby has to take care of his Aunt Martha's dog. He gives it to Lulu to take care of it.

34.SummaryEnglish: Lulu overhears her mother and thinks she is going to sell her house. Lulu tries to stop her by scaring away the potential buyers.

35.SummaryEnglish: There are new shoes in the market that are the latest fad, the problem is that everyone has them except Lulu.

37.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Annie take Alvin to the barber. But problems occur when he runs away.

38.SummaryEnglish: Alvin gets a story telling session by Tubby.

39.SummaryEnglish: Lulu desperately tries to break a world record. Ultimately breaking the records of the most unsuccessful attempts of breaking records.

40.SummaryEnglish: Marty the Midget escapes from prison again.

41.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Tubby accidentally get rid of Mr. Moppet's golf equipment and hastily get it back in time for Mr. Moppet's golf play.

42.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and friends take part in a contest involving jellybeans.

43.TitleEnglish: Iggy and the Ice Cream Factory
43.SummaryEnglish: Iggy and the Ice Cream Factory: Iggie finds a a notice in his ice cream wrapper claiming he won a free tour of the ice cream factory. Lulu, Tubby, and Iggie finds themselves touring the ice cream factory, watching how flavors are mixed, how brown cows are coated, and how a fudge over load can take lives...sort of. Lulu, Tubby, and Iggie get caught in a revolving door, and meet the owner himself, who is busy trying to develope ideas for a new flavor. Iggie comes up with peanut butter and jelly ice cream, that takes the ice cream world by storm.

44.SummaryEnglish: Lulu's father enters in a game show.

45.SummaryEnglish: Lulu's class goes on a field trip to a art museum.

46.SummaryEnglish: Lulu's class holds a trial in order to find who broke Iggie's ulkuele.

47.SummaryEnglish: Annie's mother is not a very good cook and Annie is worried that she might wreak the bake sale.

48.SummaryEnglish: Lulu tells her school class a story about her summer road trip vacation in a Recreational vehicle, with Tubby spoiling Mr. Moppet's relaxation.

49.SummaryEnglish: Bicycle Built for Too Many: Tubby's bike is stolen, and he posts reward posters all over town. Lulu and Tubby walk down the street, to see what looks like Butch, of the Westside Boys, with Tubby's bike. When they aren't looking, Tubby swipes the bike, and rides away, with the Westside Boys chasing after him. Once safe at home, Tubby finds his dad, bringing home his bike, which was ruined, when Mr. Tompkins ran over it. Tubby then realizes he stole Butch's bike.

50.SummaryEnglish: Wilbur's mother hosts a charity event.

51.SummaryEnglish: Lulu is appointed as the Mayor of the city for a day.

52.SummaryEnglish: Hooky Holiday: Tubby erges Lulu to play hooky with him. Lulu agrees when she realizes that instead of doing a math test, they have a geography test. Lulu and Tubby have trouble not being seen by any public officials. They decide to be the first kids to see a new movie coming out, but after having trouble getting to the theater, tickets are sold out. Once Lulu and Tubby arrive home, Iggie tells them they missed a field trip to the amusement park.

53.SummaryEnglish: Lulu fails her career aptitude test, she goes to the authority to report the mistake.

54.SummaryEnglish: Tubby wins a million dollars and Wilbur invites him to a country club.

55.SummaryEnglish: The school holds a dance contest.

56.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Annie take home a rabbit but trouble soon starts when it begins to multiply.

57.SummaryEnglish: Lulu directs a play, with her friends as cast members.

58.SummaryEnglish: A new kid joins the school soccer team.

59.SummaryEnglish: Lulu goes up against Wilbur in the school election.

60.SummaryEnglish: Lulu imagines herself as a superhero, with her sidekick Annie and Tubby as the villain who has taken over every TV channel that broadcast programs starring Tubby himself.

61.SummaryEnglish: Tubby makes a bet with Lulu that he can go a week without TV.

62.SummaryEnglish: Lulu wins a trip to the Wild West, unfortunately Annie is so allergic to horses that she can't even watch a western movie without breaking into a rash, so the only option left is Tubby.

63.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Tubby go to see an infomercial about exercising and health products.

64.SummaryEnglish: Construction workers plan to destroy Tubby's clubhouse and build a building over it.

65.SummaryEnglish: Lulu's soccer team must sell cookies in order to enter the national championships. Lulu and her friends host a telethon to raise money.

66.SummaryEnglish: Lulu's class holds a fair in order to raise money.

67.SummaryEnglish: Tubby gets a splinter and believing it's infected, goes to the hospital.

68.SummaryEnglish: For school's volunteer week, Lulu and Tubby help an old lady.

69.SummaryEnglish: Wilbur's father orders his butler, Cranberry, to get rid of his wife's elvis painting. However he must get it back after his wife gets upset.

70.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and Tubby along with Annie and Iggie head to a island for a picnic but they get stranded on it.

72.SummaryEnglish: Lulu's friends are busy reading a book for a test and she tries many ways to get out of reading it.

73.SummaryEnglish: Iggie's mother threatens to sent her son to military school unless he learns to stay out of trouble.

74.TitleEnglish: Dr. X's Xtremely Xelent X-Ray Spex
74.SummaryEnglish: Tubby tricks Alvin into trading a rare card for a pair of glasses that supposedly give x-ray vision.

75.SummaryEnglish: Iggie's mother threatens to sent her son to military school unless he learns to stay out of trouble.

76.SummaryEnglish: Lulu gains a mysterious calculation power enabling her to go through math quizzes successfully.

77.SummaryEnglish: Tubby's gang and Lulu try to get their hockey champion Arlin out of detention, but land themselves in trouble.

78.SummaryEnglish: Lulu and her friends work at the TV Studio to produce the 'Little Lola Show' sitcom, but it gets cancelled
